title: Were James Garner and Jennifer Garner related?

og.title: Were James Garner and Jennifer Garner related?
og.description: Answer (1 of 3): No. James Garner had one daughter (Greta Garner) with his wife, Lois Clarke to whom, apart from a 2 year separation, he remained married for just short of 58 years. Lois had one daughter Kim from a previous marriage.

twitter.title: Were James Garner and Jennifer Garner related?
twitter.description: Answer (1 of 3): No. James Garner had one daughter (Greta Garner) with his wife, Lois Clarke to whom, apart from a 2 year separation, he remained married for just short of 58 years. Lois had one daughter Kim from a previous marriage.
